optionsActionJunk: move it to the junk folder
optionsActionTrash: delete it (move to the trash folder)
optionsSMTPRecipientLabel: E-Mail address to send reports to
reportCommentPrompt: The E-Mail will be forwarded to your security team.
reportCommentJunk: It will then be moved to your junk folder.
